Description: Round-topped limestone stela with scenes and Hieroglyphic texts traced in black; unfinished.
Exhibition history: 2022 9 Feb-29 May, Spain, La Caixa, Zaragoza, Non-Finito 2021-2022 22 Sep-9 Jan, Spain, National Museum of Sculpture of Valladolid, Non-Finito 2021 7 Apr-15 Aug, Spain, CaixaForum, Mallorca, Non-Finito
